00517 RMSubRouteRequestPacket::getRouteID() const

00577 inline void
00578 RMSubRouteRequestPacket::setRouteToAll(bool routeToAll)
00579 {
00580    writeByte( ROUTE_TO_ALL_POS, routeToAll ? 1 : 0 );
00581 }
00582 
00583 inline bool
00584 RMSubRouteRequestPacket::getRouteToAll() const
00585 {
00586    return bool( readBit( ROUTE_TO_ALL_POS, ROUTE_TO_ALL_BIT_POS) );
00587 }

00590 RMSubRouteRequestPacket::getCalcSums() const
00591 {
00592    return bool ( readBit( CALC_SUM_OF_COSTS_POS,
00593                           CALC_SUM_OF_COSTS_BIT_POS ));
00594 }

00598 RMSubRouteRequestPacket::getDontSendSubRoutes() const
00599 {
00600    return bool( readBit( DONT_SEND_SUBROUTES_POS,
00601                          DONT_SEND_SUBROUTES_BIT_POS) );
00602 }

00664 inline void
00665 RMSubRouteRequestPacket::incNbrSubRoutes()
00666 {
